name: Ball Chase Tag
description:
Inspired by World Chase Tag. In this 2 player game you exchange roles between the chaser and the evader. The chaser needs to tag the evader to take his place. The evader needs to evade long enough to score a point (and stay evader). 

Use platforms, jumps, sprinting to your advantage to become the ball chase tag champion!

Controls:

  • Player 1 Keyboard
    • ZQSD : move
    • C : sprint
    • V : jump
    • Esc : Pause / start game
    Player 2 Keyboard
    • Arrow keys : move
    • Num pad 1 : sprint
    • Num pad 2 : jump
    Joystick
    • Left stick : move
    • X / left button : sprint
    • A / bottom button : jump
    • Right trigger : Pause / start game
